text: Marcello Bertinetti (born 21 July 1952) is an Italian fencer. He competed in the individual and team épée events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Italy Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics
title: Marcello Bertinetti (fencer born 1952)
